has research problem: extension of graph convolutional networks that is tailored for relation extraction, which pools information over arbitrary dependency structures efficiently in parallel

has research problem.from sentence: We propose an extension of graph convolutional networks that is tailored for relation extraction, which pools information over arbitrary dependency structures efficiently in parallel.
Relation extraction involves discerning whether a relation exists between two entities in a sentence (often termed subject and object, respectively).

has research problem: extension of the graph convolutional network (Kipf and Welling, 2017; Marcheggiani and Titov, 2017) that is tailored for relation extraction

has research problem.from sentence: In this work, we propose a novel extension of the graph convolutional network (Kipf and Welling, 2017; Marcheggiani and Titov, 2017) that is tailored for relation extraction.
